001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.extension;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.Craft;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.log.LogQuest;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.DataForge;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.Late;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.quest.SuperQuest;
008import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
009import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
010import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterContext;
011import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolutionException;
012import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ParameterResolver;
013
014import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.FrameworkConfigHolder.getFrameworkConfig;
015import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.TestContextManager.getSuperQuest;
016import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.TestContextManager.initializeParameterTracking;
017import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.util.TestContextManager.storeArgument;
018
019/**
020 * JUnit 5 {@code ParameterResolver} for injecting test data using the {@code @Craft} annotation.
021 *
022 * <p>This extension dynamically resolves parameters annotated with {@code @Craft},
023 * creating instances of the required model based on the provided configuration.
024 * The resolved object is retrieved through reflection and stored within the test execution context.
025 *
026 * <p>The resolver supports both immediate and lazy instantiation via the {@code Late} wrapper.
027 * The created objects are injected into the test method at runtime, allowing
028 * seamless data provisioning for test cases.
029 *
030 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
031 */
032public class Craftsman implements ParameterResolver {
033
034   /**
035    * Determines whether the parameter is eligible for resolution by checking
036    * for the presence of the {@code @Craft} annotation.
037    *
038    * @param parameterContext The context of the parameter to resolve.
039    * @param extensionContext The context of the test execution.
040    * @return {@code true} if the parameter is annotated with {@code @Craft}, otherwise {@code false}.
041    * @throws ParameterResolutionException If an error occurs while resolving the parameter.
042    */
043   @Override
044   public boolean supportsParameter(final ParameterContext parameterContext, final ExtensionContext extensionContext)
045         throws ParameterResolutionException {
046      return parameterContext.isAnnotated(Craft.class);
047   }
048
049   /**
050    * Resolves and injects the required test data for parameters annotated with {@code @Craft}.
051    *
052    * <p>The method identifies the expected data model, retrieves or generates the corresponding
053    * instance, and injects it into the test method. If the model is wrapped in a {@code Late} instance,
054    * it will be initialized lazily.
055    *
056    * @param parameterContext The context of the parameter to resolve.
057    * @param extensionContext The context of the test execution.
058    * @return The resolved parameter object.
059    * @throws ParameterResolutionException If the required data model cannot be instantiated.
060    */
061   @Override
062   public Object resolveParameter(final ParameterContext parameterContext, final ExtensionContext extensionContext)
063         throws ParameterResolutionException {
064      LogQuest.debug("Resolving parameter: {}", parameterContext.getParameter().getName());
065      initializeParameterTracking(extensionContext);
066
067      Class<?> parameterType = parameterContext.getParameter().getType();
068      boolean isLateResolution = parameterType.isAssignableFrom(Late.class);
069
070      return resolveParameterInternal(parameterContext, extensionContext, isLateResolution);
071   }
072
073   private Object resolveParameterInternal(ParameterContext parameterContext,
074                                           ExtensionContext extensionContext, boolean isLate) {
075      try {
076         Craft craft = parameterContext.findAnnotation(Craft.class)
077               .orElseThrow(() -> new ParameterResolutionException(
078                     "Missing @Craft annotation on parameter: " + parameterContext.getParameter().getName()));
079         SuperQuest superQuest = getSuperQuest(extensionContext);
080
081         DataForge<?> dataForge = ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(
082               DataForge.class, craft.model(), getFrameworkConfig().projectPackages());
083         Object argument = isLate ? dataForge.dataCreator() : dataForge.dataCreator().create();
084
085         storeArgument(superQuest, dataForge, argument, extensionContext);
086
087         return argument;
088      } catch (Exception e) {
089         throw new ParameterResolutionException("Failed to resolve parameter: "
090               + parameterContext.getParameter().getName(), e);
091      }
092   }
093
094}
